sub_title: Healthcare professional with rich Entrepreneurial experience and Operations Mindset
summary:
An entrepreneur with an Operations mindset and Explorers' heart !!
Recently relocated to Netherlands while pursuing the Advanced Management Program in Healthcare at Indian School of Business, part-time residential program. 
I look at exploring new avenues within healthcare at my mid-career stage by honing Business and Operational Skills. 
An ambition to broaden horizons beyond clinical, I took up health care management programs to work with the largest corporate hospitals in India like Medanta and Apollo. 
As the North region Head of Operations, I expanded the Apollo White brand across North India successfully Project Managing business commencement from scratch

 Liaisons with medical tourism companies
 Evidence based dentistry followed with a mission to ‘provide excellence in patient care with minimal
invasion at affordable prices’
 Cost Optimization using Lean Methodology to eliminate wastes- quarterly evaluations

experienced clinicians while maintaining a strong profitability
